name: vaadin-rag-system
description: Advanced RAG System for Vaadin Documentation

scripts.build: bun run --filter='core-types' build && bun run --filter='!core-types' build
scripts.ingest:v7: bun run build && bun run --filter='1-asciidoc-converter' convert -- --version 7 && bun run --filter='2-embedding-generator' generate -- --version 7
scripts.ingest:v8: bun run build && bun run --filter='1-asciidoc-converter' convert -- --version 8 && bun run --filter='2-embedding-generator' generate -- --version 8
scripts.ingest:v14: bun run build && bun run --filter='1-asciidoc-converter' convert -- --version 14 && bun run --filter='2-embedding-generator' generate -- --version 14
scripts.ingest:v24: bun run build && bun run --filter='1-asciidoc-converter' convert -- --version 24 && bun run --filter='2-embedding-generator' generate -- --version 24
scripts.ingest:v25: bun run build && bun run --filter='1-asciidoc-converter' convert -- --version 25 && bun run --filter='2-embedding-generator' generate -- --version 25
scripts.ingest:v25.1: bun run build && bun run --filter='1-asciidoc-converter' convert -- --version 25.1 && bun run --filter='2-embedding-generator' generate -- --version 25.1
scripts.ingest:all: bun run ingest:v7 && bun run ingest:v8 && bun run ingest:v14 && bun run ingest:v24 && bun run ingest:v25 && bun run ingest:v25.1
